00029 import os
00030 import base64 
00031 import tempfile
00032 
00033 from Koo.Common import Common
00034 from Koo.Common import Icons
00035 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00036 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldDelegate import *
00037 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00038 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00039 from PyQt4.uic import *
00040 
00041 (ImageFieldWidgetUi, ImageFieldWidgetBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('image.ui') ) 
00042 
00043 class ImageFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget, ImageFieldWidgetUi):
00044 
00045         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00046                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00047                 ImageFieldWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00048                 self.setupUi(self)
00049 
00050                 self.width = int( attrs.get( 'img_width', 300 ) )
00051                 self.height = int( attrs.get( 'img_height', 100 ) )
00052                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiImage )
00053                 self.connect( self.pushLoad, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.loadImage )
00054                 self.connect( self.pushSave, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.saveImage )
00055                 self.connect( self.pushRemove, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.removeImage )
00056                 self.pushSave.setEnabled( False )
00057 
00058         # This function is overriden in picture widget
00059         def getImage(self):
00060                 return self.record.value(self.name)
00061 
00062         # This function is overriden in picture widget
00063         def setImage(self, value):
00064                 self.record.setValue(self.name, value)
00065 
00066         def setReadOnly(self, ro):
00067                 self.pushLoad.setEnabled( not ro )
00068                 self.pushRemove.setEnabled( not ro )
00069 
00070         def menuEntries(self):
00071                 if self.getImage():
00072                         enableApplication = True
00073                 else:
00074                         enableApplication = False
00075 
00076                 if self.getImage():
00077                         enableImage = True
00078                 else:
00079                         enableImage = False
00080                 return [ (_('Open...'), self.openApplication, enableApplication),
00081                          ('&Show image...', self.showImage, enableImage) ]
00082 
00083         def openApplication(self):
00084                 if not self.getImage():
00085                         return
00086                 extension = ''
00087                 # Under windows platforms we need to create the temporary
00088                 # file with an appropiate extension, otherwise the system
00089                 # won't be able to know how to open it. So we let Qt guess
00090                 # what image format it is and use that as an extension.
00091                 byte = QByteArray( str(self.getImage()) )
00092                 buf = QBuffer( byte )
00093                 buf.open( QBuffer.ReadOnly )
00094                 reader = QImageReader( buf )
00095                 if reader.canRead():
00096                         extension = '.%s' % str( reader.format() )
00097 
00098                 fileName = tempfile.mktemp( extension )
00099                 fp = file(fileName,'wb')
00100                 fp.write(self.getImage())
00101                 fp.close()
00102                 Common.openFile( fileName )
00103 
00104         def showImage(self):
00105                 if not self.getImage():
00106                         return
00107                 dialog = QDialog( self )
00108                 label = QLabel( dialog )
00109                 pix = QPixmap()
00110                 pix.loadFromData( self.getImage() )
00111                 label.setPixmap( pix )
00112                 layout = QHBoxLayout( dialog )
00113                 layout.addWidget( label )
00114                 dialog.exec_()
00115 
00116         def removeImage(self):
00117                 self.setImage(False)
00118                 self.update()
00119                 self.modified()
00120 
00121         def saveImage(self):
00122                 name = QFileDialog.getSaveFileName( self, _('Save image as...') )
00123                 if name.isNull():
00124                         return
00125                 try:
00126                         fp = file(unicode(name), 'wb')
00127                         fp.write(self.getImage())
00128                         fp.close()
00129                 except:
00130                         QMessageBox.warning( self, _('Error saving file'), _('Could not save the image with the given file name. Please check that you have permissions.') )
00131                 Semantic.addInformationToFile( filename, self.record.group.resource, self.record.id, self.name )
00132 
00133         def loadImage(self):
00134                 name = QFileDialog.getOpenFileName( self, _('Open image file...') )
00135                 if not name.isNull():
00136                         image = file(unicode(name), 'rb').read()
00137                         self.setImage( image )
00138                         self.update()
00139                         self.modified()
00140 
00141         def update(self):
00142                 if self.getImage():
00143                         img = QImage()
00144                         img.loadFromData( self.getImage() )
00145                         pix = QPixmap.fromImage( img.scaled( self.width, self.height, Qt.KeepAspectRatio, Qt.SmoothTransformation ) )
00146                         self.uiImage.setPixmap( pix )
00147                 else:
00148                         self.clear()
00149 
00150         def clear(self):
00151                 self.uiImage.setText( _('(no image)') )
00152 
00153         def showValue(self):
00154                 if self.getImage():
00155                         self.pushSave.setEnabled( True )
00156                 else:
00157                         self.pushSave.setEnabled( False )
00158                 self.update()
00159 
00160         def store(self):
00161                 pass
00162 
00163 class ImageFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00164         def createEditor(self, parent, option, index):
00165                 return None
00166         
00167         def sizeHint(self, option, index):
00168                 return QSize(30, 30)
00169 
00170         def paint(self, painter, option, index):
00171                 # Paint background if row/item is selected
00172                 if (option.state & QStyle.State_Selected):
00173                         painter.fillRect(option.rect, option.palette.highlight());
00174 
00175                 value = index.model().recordFromIndex( index ).value( self.name )
00176                 image = QImage()
00177                 image.loadFromData( value )
00178                 painter.drawImage( option.rect, image )
00179 
00180 class PictureFieldWidget( ImageFieldWidget ):
00181         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00182                 ImageFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00183                 self.pushLoad.hide()
00184                 self.pushSave.hide()
00185                 self.pushRemove.hide()
00186 
00187         def getImage(self):
00188                 value = self.record.value(self.name)            
00189 
00190                 if (isinstance(value, tuple) or isinstance(value,list)) and len(value)==2:
00191                         type, data = value
00192                 else:
00193                         type, data = None, value
00194 
00195                 if not data:
00196                         return False
00197 
00198                 if type == 'stock':
00199                         stock, size = data
00200                         return self.pixmapToData( Icons.kdePixmap( stock ) )
00201                 else:
00202                         return base64.decodestring(data)
00203 
00204         def pixmapToData(self, pixmap):
00205                 if pixmap.isNull():
00206                         return False
00207                 bytes = QByteArray()
00208                 buffer = QBuffer(bytes);
00209                 buffer.open(QIODevice.WriteOnly);
00210                 pixmap.save(buffer, "BMP")
00211                 return str(bytes)
